Structs/TxConfig.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCo.name: init(sipUser:password:ringtone:ringBackTone:logLevel:)
Structs/TxConfig.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCo.abstract: Constructor of the Telnyx SDK configuration: Login using sip user and password.

Structs/TxConfig.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCo.name: init(token:ringtone:ringBackTone:logLevel:)
Structs/TxConfig.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCo.abstract: Constructor of the Telnyx SDK configuration: Login using a token.

Structs/TxCallInfo.html.name: TxCallInfo
Structs/TxCallInfo.html.abstract: TxCallInfo contains the required information of the current Call

Structs/TxConfig.html.name: TxConfig
Structs/TxConfig.html.abstract: This structure is intended to used for Telnyx SDK configurations.

Enums/CallState.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK9CallS.name: CONNECTING
Enums/CallState.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK9CallS.abstract: Call is been connected to the remote client.

Enums/CallState.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK9CallS.name: ACTIVE
Enums/CallState.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK9CallS.abstract: Call is active when two clients are fully connected.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8LogLev.name: none
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8LogLev.abstract: Disable logs. SDK logs will not printed. This is the default configuration.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8LogLev.name: verto
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8LogLev.abstract: Print verto messages. Incoming and outgoing verto messages are printed.

Enums/TxError/ServerErrorReason.html#/s:.name: signalingServerError(message:code:)
Enums/TxError/ServerErrorReason.html#/s:.abstract: Any server signaling error. We get the message and code from the server

Enums/TxError/CallFailureReason.html#/s:.name: destinationNumberIsRequired
Enums/TxError/CallFailureReason.html#/s:.abstract: There’s no destination number when placing an outbound call

Enums/TxError/CallFailureReason.html#/s:.name: sessionIdIsRequired
Enums/TxError/CallFailureReason.html#/s:.abstract: Session Id is missing when starting a call. Check you’re logged in before starting a call.

Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.name: userNameAndPasswordAreRequired
Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.abstract: sip userand sip password are missing when using the USER / PASSWORD login method

Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.name: userNameIsRequired
Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.abstract: sip user is missing when using the USER / PASSWORD login method

Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.name: passwordIsRequired
Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.abstract: password is missing when using the USER / PASSWORD login method

Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.name: tokenIsRequired
Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.abstract: token is missing when using the Token login method.

Enums/TxError/SocketFailureReason.html#/.name: socketNotConnected
Enums/TxError/SocketFailureReason.html#/.abstract: Socket is not connected. Check that you have an active connection.

Enums/TxError/SocketFailureReason.html.name: SocketFailureReason
Enums/TxError/SocketFailureReason.html.abstract: The underlying reason of the Socket connection failure

Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.name: ClientConfigurationFailureReason
Enums/TxError/ClientConfigurationFailure.abstract: The underlying reason of client setup configuration errors

Enums/TxError/CallFailureReason.html.name: CallFailureReason
Enums/TxError/CallFailureReason.html.abstract: The underlying reason of the call errors

Enums/TxError/ServerErrorReason.html.name: ServerErrorReason
Enums/TxError/ServerErrorReason.html.abstract: The underlying reason of the server errors

Enums/TxError.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK7TxError.name: clientConfigurationFailed(reason:)
Enums/TxError.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK7TxError.abstract: There’s an invalid parameter when setting up the SDK

Enums/TxError.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK7TxError.name: callFailed(reason:)
Enums/TxError.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK7TxError.abstract: There’s an invalid parameter when starting a call

Enums/TxError.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK7TxError.name: serverError(reason:)
Enums/TxError.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK7TxError.abstract: When the signaling server sends an error

Enums/TxError.html.name: TxError
Enums/TxError.html.abstract: TxError is the error type returned by Telnyx WebRTC SDK. It encompasses a few different types of errors, each with

Classes/Call.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK4CallC6ha.name: hangup()
Classes/Call.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK4CallC6ha.abstract: Call this function to hangup an ongoing call

Classes/Call.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK4CallC6an.name: answer()
Classes/Call.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK4CallC6an.abstract: Call this function to answer an incoming call

Classes/Call.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK4CallC9mu.name: muteAudio()
Classes/Call.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK4CallC9mu.abstract: Mutes the audio of the active call.

Classes/Call.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK4CallC11u.name: unmuteAudio()
Classes/Call.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK4CallC11u.abstract: Unmutes the audio of the active call.

Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.name: calls
Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.abstract: Keeps track of all the created calls by theirs UUIDs

Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.name: delegate
Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.abstract: Subscribe to TxClient delegate to receive Telnyx RTC events

Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.name: connect(txConfig:)
Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.abstract: Connects to the iOS client to the Telnyx signaling server using the desired login credentials.

Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.name: disconnect()
Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.abstract: Disconnects the TxClient from the Telnyx signaling server.

Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.name: getSessionId()
Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.abstract: Obtaian the current session ID after loggin in to Telnyx server.

Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.name: isConnected()
Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.abstract: Check if TxClient is connected to Telnyx servers.

Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.name: getCall(callId:)
Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.abstract: This function can be used to access any active call tracked by the SDK.

Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.name: newCall(callerName:callerNumber:destinationNumber:callId:)
Classes/TxClient.html#/s:9WebRTCSDK8TxCl.abstract: Creates a Call and starts the call sequence, negotiate the ICE Candidates and sends the invite.

Classes/TxClient.html.name: TxClient
Classes/TxClient.html.abstract: The TelnyxRTC client connects your application to the Telnyx backend,
